english.segment1: all my dreams. I had dreamed were dreams of me. all my hopes. were desires of what I wanted to be. with ambitions put aside. I crawl in your arms to hide. I have given up to you
english.segment2: this is all (this is all). this is everything. this is all (this is all). this is everything. this is everything I've got
english.segment3: the good things. and the bad things are in your hands. my hopes and my dreams. are in your command. and I come before you now. as imperfect as I am. and I give. yes, I give it all to you
